variant.p: In response to the comments from respondents, the Board decided to provide a definition of an investment entity based on some of the criteria originally proposed in the Investment Entities ED. An entity that meets the definition of an investment entity would not consolidate its controlled subsidiaries (other than those subsidiaries that provide investment-related services or activities).
